speakerTopic.text: To be human is to be creative, but knowing how to cultivate that creativity is tragically uncommon. These are the secrets we've learned over the past 7 years of exercising our creativity to bring entertainment to over 100 million fans across the globe.
speakerTopic.title: 4 Secrets For Creating Magic: How to Cultivate Your Creativity to Get to Your Best Ideas Faster
Regaining Childlike Wonder: Ditching Assumptions and Welcoming New Ideas

speakerBioSummary.text:
• Zach King is a filmmaker, entrepreneur, and overall social media sensation, being named one of Instagram’s Top 100 Most Followed users.
  • Zach is one of the most followed TikTok accounts in the world with nearly 70 million followers.
  • Zach creates content for over 100 million fans as well as companies such as Disney, Hasbro, Nike, Amazon, Coca-Cola, and many more.
  • Zach is best known for his social media “magic,” using his platforms to create short videos full of clever magic tricks that he calls "digital sleight of hand."
  • His work has landed him features on The Ellen DeGeneres Show, Good Morning America, Adweek, and People and he was also a contender on the Amazing Race.
  • Zach is also the author of three books for middle schoolers that were released worldwide by Harper Collins.

speakerBiography.text:
Zach King — the LA-based filmmaker known for his clever magic tricks and “digital sleight of hand”, is one of social media’s most prominent content creators. With a combined social reach of over 100 million followers, Zach’s magical content has delighted fans all over the world.

Zach has been featured on The Ellen DeGeneres Show, Good Morning America, Adweek, and People. His company, King Studio, has partnered with brands such as Disney, Apple, Nike, Coca-Cola, Amazon, and many others. Zach has also created one-of-a-kind collaborations with celebrities like Tom Brady, Selena Gomez, Terry Crews, David Blaine, and others.

Recently, Zach has expanded onto the TikTok platform, where he has seen incredible growth. He set a record for the most-viewed TikTok video of all time at over 2.2 Billion views. At nearly 70 million followers, he’s one of the most followed accounts in the world.

speakerReview.text: The team really enjoyed Zach's delivery, speaking points, and creative challenge. A huge thank you to Zach for working with us on this event!
speakerReview.title: SPEAKER REVIEW

speakerReview.text: Zach was great! It was a really good event.
speakerReview.title: SPEAKER REVIEW

speakerReview.text: Sending along much gratitude to Zach for the fantastic work on our virtual awards event. The videos worked nicely and Berkshire Hathaway was delighted.
speakerReview.title: SPEAKER REVIEW
